==Trivia==
*{{Lang|Alexander Rotchev|ru=Александр Ротчев|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Александр Ротчев}}}} was a Russian writer and traveler, and the last ruler of the {{w|Fort Ross, California|Fort Ross colony}}.
